title: Miniature Portrait of Sir Arthur Wellesley, Duke of Wellington (1769-1852)
medium: watercolor on ivory; gold metal frame
provenance_text: Sir Philip Rose, 1st Baronet of Rayners [1816-1883], Buckinghamshire, England; Collection d'Allegre sale, Paris, France, on May 13, 1872. (Sold at J. E. Barr & Co., Philadelphia, PA, by 1907); purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, 1907; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927.

creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, ÃŽle-de-France, France)
